brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine whether synthetic hernia mesh materials undergo
      physical and/or chemical changes while in the body.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:

          -  Age ≥ 18 yrs

          -  Previous placement of hernia mesh material

          -  Current need for excision of previous mesh placement or Current need for
             intra-abdominal surgical procedure

        Exclusion criteria:

          -  Age < 18 yrs

          -  No retained mesh prosthetic.

          -  Non surgical candidate

          -  Prisoner

study_pop.textblock: Subjects will be recruited from study investigators' patient population.

clinical_study.official_title: Characterization of Explanted Hernia Meshes From Human Subjects: A Prospective Study

primary_outcome.description: Each specimen will be graded and given fibrosis score of 0 - 4 to establish the degree of inflammation/foreign body reaction that occurred while mesh was in vivo.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Each specimen will be tested for tensile strength to determine force versus displacement.

The total amount of collagen and non-collagenous proteins in cultured cell layers and tissue sections by differential staining with two dyes, sirius red and fast green. Sirius Red binds to all types of collagen, whereas fast green stains non-collagenous proteins.
secondary_outcome.measure: Collagen protein levels of explanted mesh.

secondary_outcome.description: Identify possible clinical characteristics which affect mesh degradation.
secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with history of radiation to abdomen/pelvis

secondary_outcome.description: Identify possible clinical characteristics which affect mesh degradation.
secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with history of chemotherapy

secondary_outcome.description: Identify possible clinical characteristics which affect mesh degradation.
secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with corticosteroid/immunosuppression therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Identify possible clinical characteristics which affect mesh degradation.
secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with history of tobacco use

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
